name: Harville
description:
Welcome to Harville, Dr. Vestor.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- E to interact

- Left Click to attack

Happy Harvesting!

As you can very well see, this game is missing a lot of core functionalities including, sound, menus, money, stuff like that. However, I still wanna publish this, as I can still put out updates later on.

Dr. Harry Vestor was once a renowned surgeon on the top of the social pyramid, everyone wanted to fuck.

These kinds of people attract enemies, soon he was framed for murder and revoked of his medical license, and so he was exiled to the slums.

To survive, he utilized his knowledge of the human body and the fact that organs sell good, he started his journey back to society, by harvesting organs.
